patterns: Give me some information about M.H.Saboo Siddik College of Engineering
responses: M. H. Saboo Siddik (commonly known as MHSS or Saboo Siddik or Saboo) is an engineering college located in Byculla at Saboo Siddik Polytechnic Road, Mumbai, India, affiliated with the University of Mumbai.It is an 'A' Grade institution, and is accredited by AICTE.

patterns: where can we find the college
responses: The college address is: 8, MH Saboo Siddik Polytechnic Rd, Police Colony, Nagpada, Byculla, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400008

patterns: What kind of Infrastructure are present in the college
responses: The college building accommodates workshops, laboratories, classrooms, lecture halls, drawing halls, student's common room, seminar hall, library, reading-rooms, offices. The library of the College is housed in a separate building and it has reference sections and reading-rooms for students and staff.

patterns: How many departments are there in the college
In total there are how many departments
Tell me about numbers of departments
responses: In total there are total 8 departments
In M.H. Saboo Siddik College of Engineering there are 8 Departments

patterns: Which departments are there in the college?
Can you tell me the names of the department
responses:
The 8 departments of MHSSCOE are: 1.Automobile Engineering 
 2.Civil Engineering 
 3.Computer Engineering 
 4.Computer Science and Engineering [Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning] 
 5.Computer Science and Engineering [IoT & Cyber Security, Blockchain]
 6.Electronic and Telecommunication Engineering
 7.Information Technology
 8.Mechanical Engineering

patterns: Is mhsscoe accepting applications for admission in 2022?
Is admission open in the college
Which streams are free for admissions
responses: Yes the admission are open for the year 2022-2023
It's my please to announce that the admissions for the effective year 2022-2023 are open
Yes, the admissions for the first year are open for the 7 departments except Automobile Engineering(Direct Second year only)

How can i get enrolled in the college
responses:
You should have taken the MHT-CET or JEE test in addition to finishing your HSC in the science stream.
 For any further admission related query you can contact Admission Team: 
 Dr .G. Kame Chief Admission Officer

patterns: Who is the Principal of the college
responses: Dr. Ganesh Kame is the Principal of the College

patterns: What is the vision of the collge
responses: To bring out the whole Muslim Community from the quagmire of poverty and educational backwardness and encourage, enlighten and prepare all its members to be useful citizens who will contribute to make a prosperous, healthy and strong nation and to promote national integration by giving equal opportunity to all communities for their promotion and progress.

Automobile engineering is one of the oldest departments of MHSSCE and also in the Mumbai University established in 1985 with the aim of providing industry ready automobile engineers. In present time automotive industries are considered to be the back bone of manufacturing sector in India, which is also evident by India’ s aim to become hub of manufacturing of electric vehicles. In automobile engineering program the students learn from fundamental to advanced concept and their implementation in solving real world problem through quality and research based projects.
 Department of Automobile engineering is having well equipped laboratories where students implement the concepts they learned. We are having knowledgeable, dedicated and focused faculty members as well as lab assistant. In order to keep students updated with latest trends in technology, department organizes seminar, workshops for hands on training from industry expert. 
 Department is one of the most active members of SAEINDIA in western India section since 2002.The collegiate club organizes various activities under the banner of SAEINDIA for the enhancement of students knowledge . Students participate in various national and international competitions such as BAJA, FSAE-SUPRA, and EBIKE etc

The Computer Engineering Department of M. H. Saboo Siddik College of Engineering also plays its role in imparting education to brilliant minds who arrive with the promise of potential and leave as professionals ready to step out and change the world. The department houses teaching facilities and dedicated faculty that are well versed in preparing students both theoretically and practically in various streams and facets of Computer Engineering and Technology.

Department of Construction Engineering was established in 1984 which was later converted to Department of Civil Engineering in the year 2001. With its twelve versatile full time permanent faculties, the department provides high quality teaching and drive the mind of students towards higher studies and research. The department strives to make students identify the practical solutions to the current industrial problems. The department faculties are not only instructors and guides to the students; they also act as mentors and counselors to the students. 
 The department’s one point perspective is development of ethical and sustainable world through advancement in technology. With this goal the entire department put efforts for quality education so as to provide technical solutions for industrial challenges. The department tries to develop technical and leadership skills and entrepreneur aspirations among students so as to create jobs in our society keeping moral and ethical values in mind. 
 The department has faculties who are advisor on the boards for various interviews conducted by the government for filling the post. The department extends help to university at syllabus revision proposals and drafting. The faculties are external referees for Master level Project and Phd Thesis evaluations. They are auditors for Question Paper Setting Committee at various deemed university. They are expert speakers at various national and international conferences and have provided expert lectures to various institutes.

The department of mechanical engineering has distinguished legacy of achievements in technological innovation, and continuously striving to improve the same. Our students as a technocrat are present all over the world and adding the prestige to the name of the department and the institute. 
 The department has a team of qualified and experienced faculty members to provide quality technical education and to imbibe creative approach in the students, required for technological developments. The core values of the department help the students to develop the professional approach to make them competent at global level.

patterns: Tell me about Electronic and Telecommunication Department
What is Electronic and Telecommunication Department
responses: Department of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering was established in the year 2008 with an intake of 60 students with the objective of imparting the knowledge and developing practical skills in various areas of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering . Department has clear vision to become centre of excellence in the various domain of Telecommunication Engineering. The department motivates its students to participate in co-curricular and extra-curricular activities essential for development and nurturing of team spirit and developing organizational skills. The department has experts and well trained human resources and well equipped laboratories to impart domain specific knowledge

patterns: Tell me about Information Technology Department
responses: IT is the best department of MHSSCE as it has the highest number of placement records.

The Mohammed Haji Saboo Siddik Institute (A Muslim Minority Institution) owes its existence to the munificence of late Mohammed, son of Haji Saboo Siddik, who bequeathed a large sum of money for establishing, conducting and managing this Institution for imparting Vocational, Technical and Industrial training and education. The value of the assets, so bequeathed, exceeded Rupees Three Crore at the time of donation. 
 The Institution is managed and administrated by the Anjuman-i-Islam as the sole trustee, appointed by the Bombay High Court's decree and scheme framed and sanctioned thereunder. 
 The very well laid out college building accommodates workshops, laboratories, classrooms, lecture halls, drawing halls, students' common room, seminar hall, library, reading-rooms, offices, etc. with modern facilities. The College is accommodated in an exclusively newly-constructed spacious ground plus five floors building. The library of the College is housed in a separate newly-constructed building and is furnished with reference section and reading-rooms for students and staff. A very sophisticated Seminar Hall furnished with the most modern equipment was inaugurated by Dr. Raja Ramanna, an eminent scientist of our country, on the annual day celebrations on 9th April, 2001. A spacious and well-furnished cafeteria is also operative in the campus.
